item.title: How do you make a client connect to a server your hosting
item.dc:creator: @pregg pregg
item.description:
@pregg wrote:

some crappy open sorce one…java in lava or something. i was going to use eyrescape but i cant find the DL[br][size=1]Posted on: July 17, 2007, 07:44:27 PM[/size][hr] public final URL getCodeBase() { if(signlink.mainapp != null) return signlink.mainapp.getCodeBase(); try { if(super.aFrame_Sub1_15 != null) return new URL("http://127.0.0.1:" + (43594 + anInt958)); } is something wrong with that or is it somewhere else in my client.

Read full topic

item.title: How do you make a client connect to a server your hosting
item.dc:creator: @pregg pregg
item.description:
@pregg wrote:

OK im trying to make my client that i edited connect to the server im hosing,and only that. How do i do that. I get the connection error every time i try.

EDIT- public final URL getCodeBase() { if(signlink.mainapp != null) return signlink.mainapp.getCodeBase(); try { if(super.aFrame_Sub1_15 != null) return new URL("http://127.0.0.1:" + (43594 + anInt958)); } tis what im using.

Read full topic
